text: midneunjadeul-iyeo satan-ui dwileul ttaleuji malla satan-ui dwileul ttaleuneun ja-ege satan-eun geulo hayeogeum hangsang joeaggwa bihaeng-eul beomhadolog hanila man-il neohui wie hananim-ui eunchong-gwa jabiga eobs-eossdamyeon neohui gaunde eo neu nugudo cheong-gyeolhal su eobs-eoss-eulila geuleona hananim-eun geubun-ui tteus-i iss neun jaleul cheong-gyeolke hasyeossnani hananim eun deul-eusimgwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila
